entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as the group that Umbridge had nearly caught. It is described as a secret group and the danger of being overheard was very slight in Charms class.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one whose mail has been read by Umbridge. He is also described as having a conversation with Ron and Hermione about how Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as being part of the conversation between Harry, Hermione, and himself about how Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being part of the conversation between Harry, Ron, and herself about how Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as having read Harry's mail. She is also described as having nearly caught Sirius.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as being attacked by Umbridge.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who was nearly caught by Umbridge.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as accusing Harry of ordering something.

relationships.description: Umbridge attacked Hedwig. This is described in the text where Hermione says 'You think Umbridge attacked Hedwig?'
Harry's mail has been read by Umbridge. This is described in the text where Dumbledore says 'mbridge has been reading your mail, Harry.'
Harry and his friends are concerned about Sirius who was nearly caught by Umbridge. This is described in the text where they have a whispered discussion about how Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius.
Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius. This is described in the text where Harry, Ron, and Hermione have a whispered discussion about how Umbridge had nearly caught Sirius.
